column5: Looking for some thoughts on when the best time to fish the Attawapiskat would be if I were interested in catching lots of northern pike with some trophies available. I know when it comes to lakes, soon after ice-out when the pigs are in the bays is ideal. However, I do not have a lot of experience with river fishing and wanted to get some input. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks. Cozzmo
that are part of the fishible water depends more on water level, I was at Eddies in Jule one hot year with water level very low and fishable water was 1/4 of normal area, but still caught 8 trophies
Best time will be in 2025 when the border re-opens lol
